articles.title: Mask mandate, business restrictions lifted in Butte - Montana Standard
articles.description: Masks will no longer be mandated in public places in Butte-Silver Bow County as of 8 a.m. on Wednesday. The other business restrictions — early closing times and limited capacity
articles.content:
It was a change of tune from the Board of Health meeting on March 10, when Sullivan and the Board discussed how business restrictions would be rescinded if metrics were met.
